input.sentences: we are having a basic training task today .
we will be going into the community to show how we respond .

output.sentences: Nine members of the basic training group were given a task.
The task was to respond to the needs of the community.
The task was to prepare the community for the storm.
The group spend time securing windows,
Due to the group accomplishing this task the town was prepared,
